title: What games do you play when you aren't playing League?
body: I jump around between the games I play a lot at the moment if I ain't on League I'm on KSP or OSU, what games do you play when you aren't playing League?

replies.body: Right now aside from league I am playing Shadow of Mordor and Dragon Age: Inquisition
Why is General Discussion gone? coz im used to it
planetside 2, pokemon,  dark souls 2, csgo, masturbation simulator 2014: 3D edition.
Am I the only one that plays Heroes of Might and Magic? :)

I atypically play Dungeon and rush Dragons only with 1 hero max (artificial restrictions self imposed).

My brother does the meanest undead necro rush you've ever seen. HOMM3 only ofc.
Hearthstone, Dawn of War: Soulstorm/dark crusade.

Depends on my mood and what is in the rotation. Several games are always in my rotation like Skyrim (last count I'm at about 317 mods, nerdgasm you will have with 4K textures).

Warframe, Minecraft, StarCraft, WarZone 2100, SW:TOR, the entire X-Com series and TF2. Those are the games I always come back to.

Then I have fresh releases and small titles which I play from time to time, on release or in bursts of flavour. Such as Shadow of Mordor which I'm having fun 100%ing slowly as I %%%% around, or 7 Days to Die and Rust where I band together with some friends and usually end up taking a break because some 12 year olds are hacking.
Loadout. From Steam. OP game
i play dragon city and kingdom hearts

advance wars> fire emblem

come at me bro =D
advance war
Advance Wars*

Generally I play Osu, CS:GO, hearthstone and just random flash games on Kongregate.
Gotta say I am surprised at all the people that play osu...
Used to play just cause 2 and games like that but just cbf

> Dota 2 (Don't give off hate now)

KILL IT WITH FIRE!

I would be playing GTA 4 but the dam thing wont work...

Been playing a lot of SPAZ.
Faster then light, pokemon and hearthstone
CSGO and killing floor.
World Of Warcrack and I switch around on fighting games since I'm a big fan of the genre.

Team Fortress 2 (I am the 1% of the TF2 playerbase that ISNT under 16 years of age), Any Souls game, currently going through good ol' Dark Souls after finishing Demons Souls again (super hyped for BloodBorne), and Borderlands: The Pre Sequel.
World of Warcraft, Hearthstone, Fire Emblem, Pokemon.
Currently: Dragon Age: Inquisition, Shadow of Mordor and of course Final Fantasy: A Realm Reborn.
Age of empires 1/2 and their expansions, minecraft, wakfu, and a little bit of TOME/Heroes of the Storm
Currently working on getting all plushies in fnaf 2, and just getting into hearthstone.
Semi-professional at Tetris and I play words with friends with my receptionist at work!
CS:GO, Minecraft and Town of Salem.
Just finished Dishonored and got the %%%% ending :( now im onto Tomb Raider.
Borderlands the pre-sequel and F1 2014 is what i usually play when not playing LoL.
Age of Empires on steam.
Minecraft or Runescape OS (just started it but I'm getting into it). Sometimes a bit of random Steam games or osu!
